name: Safety Squad
description:
You are on a galactic adventure. Your mission, should you choose to accept it is do collect all the yellow energy, but you must do so safely! Sound to hard to do alone? Well don't worry, your squad has your back.

This game is compatible with phones, tablets, and computers.

  CONTROLS:

  • Tap / click where you want to go.
  • Don't hit the mines!
  • Collect all 5 of the yellow energies.
  • Use your squad to protect the mothership!
